segments.text: Hi Jane , can you let me know the best way to get to your house this evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , where will you be coming from ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need to be in the city centre this afternoon so I will be coming straight from there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . Take the Underground ( the Circle line ) to High Street Kensington . Make sure you take the High Street Kensington exit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok - when you leave the Underground , cross the road and you should see Horntown Street . Was up that street to the crossroads . As you was you should see a fast food place on your right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hold on , I am looking at the map now . Ok , I can see Horntown Road . Do I go straight at the intersection ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you need to turn left into Philimore Was and take the next right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , I can see that road .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's fine . You will not miss it because it's just next to the Kensington centra Library .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good , I can see the library on the map .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , we live in the third building on your left . Will we see you around 7 pm ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great , see you at seven .
segments.speaker: S1
